short_summary: procurement of archival sample boxes for the national mineral collection
description: the department of natural resources (nrcan) has a requirement to establish a contract for the supply and delivery of archival samples boxes for the national mineral collection.
full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
==========================

### Archival Samples Boxes for the National Mineral Collection

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites bids from qualified suppliers for the provision of Archival Samples Boxes for the National Mineral Collection.

**Tender Details**

* **Tender Reference:** WS4392045485
* **Publication Date:** January 30, 2024
* **Closing Date:** February 19, 2024 at 14:00 HAE
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Bidding

**Procurement Requirements**

NRCan requires the supply and delivery of Archival Samples Boxes to support the needs of the National Mineral Collection. Bidders must submit a detailed proposal outlining their capacity to meet the required specifications and timelines.

**Debriefing**

Bidders may request a debriefing on the evaluation results within 15 working days from the receipt of the bid assessment report. The debriefing will be provided in writing or by telephone.

**Specifications and Requirements**

* **PSUPC Code:** 24121500 (Packaging boxes and bags and pouches)
* **Quantitative Requirements:** [Specify in Tender Documents]
* **Qualitative Requirements:** [Specify in Tender Documents]

**Key Dates**

* **Bid Submission Deadline:** February 19, 2024 at 14:00 HAE
* **Debriefing Request Deadline:** Within 15 working days from the receipt of the bid assessment report

**Contact Information**

* **Point of Contact:** Dustin Levere (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [dustin.levere@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:dustin.levere@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** [Not Provided]

**Additional Information**

For more information and to access the tender documents, please visit the following link:

[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18657157?extsite=MTg2NTcxNTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18657157?extsite=MTg2NTcxNTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

It maintains the essential information required for the tender announcement while conforming to standard formatting conventions.
